entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Carman
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
